title: Wouldnt connect to server/find it
body:
Checked internet connection and all was fine, yet after 6 minutes of hitting the ok prompt to retry connection to sever it was still not connecting, didnt even see loading screen, yet when i hit cancel and went to reconnect through client it connected fine and i was given leaver and a loss for promos. is this correct that the retry command that pops up during the loading of the ingame client should be ignored and you should reconnect through the client,
*was using the new client
There was no interruptions to my network as i was wathcing a stream during these events

replies.body: I just had this same issue, rip me, does anyone know if riot will cancel this loss or something? in my first 10 placement games, "leaving" is such a waste   :(
